name: TensorAlgebra.GradedAlgebra.ι_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
M : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : AddCommMonoid M
inst✝ : Module R M
m : M
⊢ Eq ((TensorAlgebra.GradedAlgebra.ι R M) m) ((DirectSum.of (fun i => Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (HPow.hPow (LinearMap.range (TensorAlgebra.ι R)) i) x) 1) ⟨(TensorAlgebra.ι R) m, ⋯⟩)
decl:
theorem GradedAlgebra.ι_apply (m : M) :
    GradedAlgebra.ι R M m =
      DirectSum.of (fun (i : ℕ) => ↥(LinearMap.range (TensorAlgebra.ι R : M →ₗ[_] _) ^ i)) 1
        ⟨TensorAlgebra.ι R m, by simpa only [pow_one] using LinearMap.mem_range_self _ m⟩ :=
  rfl
